title: Amy Mihaljevic /// Part 1 /// 308
description:
Amy Mihaljevic /// Part 1 /// 308

Part 1 of 2

www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

This week Nic and the Captain revisit one of Northeast Ohio’s coldest cases. Join us for an in-depth review and discussion of the abduction of 10 year old Amy Mihaljevic. Beer of the Week - Pink Drink by Hi-Wire Brewing Garage Grade - 3 & 3 Quarter Bottle Caps out of 5
